item.description:
Meet & Mingle Pot Luck Dance Party
Sunday, September 5th.
7:00 PM to Midnight.

48 Below Night Club
55 Water Street
Exeter, NH 03833

Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Co-host: Joan Dg7 Dg7 603-305-7114 .
Cover charge: $5 & Bring some food to share
Cash bar with coffee & tea, No dress code.

Please join Steve O, Joan Dg7, and friends for an evening of dancing, drinks, and, socializing in a chic, intimate new club. 48 Below is in the historic building formerly known as the Loka Theater. The door for 48 Below is on the left side of the main doors for the theater. Come socialize with friends and dance to the club's DJ in a fun new setting. Please get there as early as possible so you can be introduced to everyone. Also, plenty of parking on the street and in the lot accross the street.

Hosts: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net or
Co-Host: Joan Dg7 603-305-7114 .

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Pot Luck Meet & Mingle Dance Party
